points.title: The user is informed about security practices

case.title: Information is provided about security practices
case.localized_title: L'utilisateur est informé des pratiques de sécurité
case.description: It's important to know what security measures are taken to protect your data from unauthorized access. This case applies to the Agreements that precisely explain their security practices.

points.title: The service can delete your account without prior notice

case.title: Your account can be deleted or permanently suspended without prior notice and without a reason
case.localized_title: Le service peut supprimer votre compte sans préavis
case.description: At any time, your account can be terminated without explanation and without warning by the service.

points.title: This service is only available to users of a certain age

case.title: This service is only available to users over a certain age
case.localized_title: Ce service n'est accessible qu'aux utilisateurs d'un certain âge.
case.description: The Services are intended for users who are at least a certain age. If you are younger than the age required then you are prohibited from using the Service.

points.title: The service provides two factor authentification for your account

case.title: Two factor authentication is provided for your account
case.localized_title: Le service fournit une authentification à deux facteurs pour votre compte
case.description: The service provides means of further securing your account with two factor authentification, thus greatly improving account security.

points.title: User logs are deleted after a finite period of time

case.title: Logs are deleted after a finite period of time
case.localized_title: Les journaux des utilisateurs sont supprimés après une période de temps déterminée.
case.description: Logs are text files containing some information about web visitors, such as user agents (showing for instance that you're connecting from Firefox for Android) and ip addresses (which reveal your approximate location). This case applies to Services that periodically delete their logs to prevent user sessions being tracked over time.

points.title: You have the right to leave this service at any time

case.title: You have the right to leave this service at any time
case.localized_title: Vous avez le droit de quitter ce service à tout moment
case.description: You can stop using the service and/or cancel or delete your account at any time for any reason. Moreover, the termination is reasonably fast and simple.

points.title: There is a date of the last update of the agreements

case.title: There is a date of the last update of the agreements
case.localized_title: Il y a une date de la dernière mise à jour des accords.
case.description: The given text has a date that allows to know when it was last updated.

points.title: Your personal data is not sold

case.title: Your personal data is not sold
case.localized_title: Vos données personnelles ne sont pas vendues
case.description: This service makes an explicit promise not to sell "personal data" of users.

points.title: The service allows you to use pseudonyms

case.title: Pseudonyms are allowed
case.localized_title: Le service vous permet d'utiliser des pseudonymes
case.description: You don't need to provide your full name to use the Service and you are allowed to use a pseudonym instead.

points.title: Private messages can be read

case.title: Private messages can be read
case.localized_title: Les messages privés peuvent être lus
case.description: The Service is able to access, scan, review or read all user communications, including private messages, which may contain personal or sensitive data.

points.title: This service collects your IP address, which can be used to view your approximate location

case.title: Your IP address is collected, which can be used to view your approximate location
case.localized_title: Ce service recueille votre adresse IP, qui peut être utilisée pour déterminer votre emplacement approximatif.

points.title: The posting of untagged pornographic content is prohibited

case.title: The posting of pornographic content is prohibited
case.localized_title: La publication de contenus pornographiques non marqués est interdite.
case.description: Users are not allowed to post any content of pornographic nature. This includes adult content, things that are sexually explicit, or obscene.

points.title: This service offers a symbolic but nonbinding statement about a matter of opinion, ethics, society, or politics

case.title: This service offers a symbolic but nonbinding statement about a matter of opinion, ethics, society, or politics
case.localized_title: Ce service propose une déclaration symbolique mais non contraignante sur une question d'opinion, d'éthique, de société ou de politique.
case.description: If a service expresses a worldview antithetical to the user’s, that is a good signal that they should not use the service. Or conversely, if the service expresses an uncommonly-held belief that the user agrees with and thinks is relevant to the service-user relationship and/or important, they may wish to use that to choose between otherwise comparable services.

points.title: You shall not interfere with another person's enjoyment of the service

case.title: You shall not interfere with another person's enjoyment of the service
case.localized_title: Vous ne devez pas interférer avec la jouissance du service par une autre personne.
case.description:
Users are asked not to interfere with another person't enjoyment in using the service.
However, this statement is very vague and open to interpretation by the service itself.

points.title: You agree not to submit libelous, harassing or threatening content

case.title: You agree not to submit libelous, harassing or threatening content
case.localized_title: Vous acceptez de ne pas soumettre de contenu diffamatoire, harcelant ou menaçant.
case.description: This service prohibits users from submitting content of a variety of types. This can include content that is unlawful, harassing, abusive, threatening, libelous, sexist, racist, homophobic, transphobic, or discriminatory in any other way.

points.title: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to you

case.title: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to you
case.localized_title: Les conditions peuvent être modifiées à tout moment, à leur discrétion, sans préavis.
case.description: The Agreements can be updated at any time, including in a way that negatively affects user rights, without notifying before or after the changes.

points.title: Details are provided about what kind of information they collect

case.title: Information is provided about what kind of information they collect
case.localized_title: Des détails sont fournis sur le type d'informations collectées.
case.description: The Privacy Policy describes in detail the data collected through the website and through the services provided.

points.title: This service gives your personal data to third parties involved in its operation

case.title: This service gives your personal data to third parties involved in its operation
case.localized_title: Ce service transmet vos données personnelles à des tiers impliqués dans son fonctionnement
case.description: Your personal data is or may be given to third parties essential to the service’s operation. This could be an external spam detection service for an internet forum.

points.title: The publishing of personally identifiable information without the owner’s consent is not allowed

case.title: The publishing of personally identifiable information without the owner’s consent is not allowed
case.localized_title: La publication d'informations personnellement identifiables sans le consentement du propriétaire n'est pas autorisée.
case.description: Users agree not to publicly post personally identifiable information (name, postal address, contact information…) without the owner’s knowledge or consent

points.title: The service is open-source

case.title: The service is open-source
case.localized_title: Le service est open-source
case.description: The code of the software is open-source and the users can have access to the source code.

points.title: You are prohibited from sending chain letters, junk mail, spam or any unsolicited messages

case.title: You are prohibited from sending chain letters, junk mail, spam or any unsolicited messages
case.localized_title: Il vous est interdit d'envoyer des chaînes de lettres, du courrier indésirable, du spam ou tout autre message non sollicité.
case.description: Users are not allowed to use the service for chain letters, junk mail, spamming or any other distribution of content to people who have not agreed to receiving it.

points.title: This service reserves the right to disclose your personal information without notifying you

case.title: Your personal data may be disclosed to comply with government requests without notice to you
case.localized_title: Ce service se réserve le droit de divulguer vos informations personnelles sans vous en informer
case.description: If the Government governing the Terms requests personal data of a user of this service, they may not inform/notify the user while complying with the request.
